item.title: Report E-2024080490
item.description:
Report E-2024080490

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-06
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On August 6, 2024, four (4) 5-gallon pails of UN3266 tipped over in transit and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior and adjacent items. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. FCE personnel utilized absorbents and neutralizers to remediate the impacted site. All spent absorbents were collected in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The four (4) damaged pails were containerized in one (1) additional 55-gallon drum.
